unit: Unit 9 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Slopes
title: Starting Salary vs College GPA
question_text: Sixty-five random recent college graduates were selected and asked their college grade point average (GPA) as well as their starting salary on their first job.  This resulted in a a regression equation of $\hat{y}=9.7x + 23.6$ where $x$ is GPA and $\hat{y}$ is the predicted salary (in thousands of dollars). The standard error was $0.25$ . Find a $99\%$ confidence interval for the slope and interpret it.

We have convincing evidence that there is an association between theses two variables.
